net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.command:
<!-- Create an input w/ Tabs. Each tab is a weapon known to the token --> <!-- token property has a list of Weapons-->
<!-- Included in the weapon list, always last, is "New Weapon" w/ default values -->
<!-- Each tab is identical in form including a Name field and the same fields as Single Attack has --> <!-- The weapon name is the "key" for the property name that stores a json string of the chosen values for that weapon -->
<!-- Those values are used for the attack roll -->
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: Dynamic example
